trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SEQ_00<tab>Serendipity would like to officially begin your training as a goldsmith.

TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SEQ_01<tab>For your first lesson, the guildmaster bids you craft for her a single copper ingot. If needed, you may purchase the copper ore from Aistan, though wind shards must be obtained elsewhere.

TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SEQ_02<tab>Although Serendipity is pleased with your copper ingot, her assistant, Gigi, declares it unfit to bear night soil. Nevertheless, the guildmaster declares that you have talent, and that you should return once you have gained more experience.
※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 5.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_TODO_00<tab>Deliver a copper ingot to Serendipity.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_1<tab>Great, let's get started! Though to be honest, I'd swear you've done this before by the way you wear that hammer on your hip.

TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_2<tab>Mind you, even if you <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> have some experience, a <var 1A 02 /var>responsible<var 1A 01 /var> guildmaster must ensure that her charges have a firm grasp of the fundamentals. Therefore, I command you to craft me a copper ingot!
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_3<tab>It's simple, really─all you need is copper ore and a wind shard.

TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_4<tab>Our guild supplier, Aistan, can supply you with copper ore. And I gave you a few wind shards along with your hammer. At least, I think I did. If it turns out you don't have any, you'll need to get some yourself.

TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_5<tab>Isn't this exciting, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Your first real challenge as a member of the Goldsmiths' Guild! Show me the ingot when you're done. Good luck!

TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SYSTEM_000_6<tab>To synthesize a copper ingot for Serendipity, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Logs<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the main menu, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_7<tab>A farewell to cut tags.

TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_8<tab>Oh, did you forget what materials you need? Aistan over there can sell you copper ore, but I'm afraid he doesn't stock wind shards. Don't think too hard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Just give it a try and see what happens!
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_9<tab>Hmmm... You know, I think this is quite─
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_GIGI_000_10<tab>NE※GIGIGI★※... GIGIGI☆...BZZZT.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_GIGI_000_11<tab>UtTeR gArBaGe. ThE wOrSt. NoT eVeN fIt FoR mAkInG a ChAmBeR pOt.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_12<tab>Quiet, Gigi! <var 1A 02 /var>I'm<var 1A 01 /var> the guildmaster. <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> get to decide what's fit for a chamber pot!
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_13<tab>Ahem, please excuse me! He gets a bit overzealous at times.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_14<tab>Gigi is my assistant, but he has a habit of butting in with his opinions.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_15<tab>Most mammets are rather simple, capable of no more than rudimentary speech. They can be relied upon for menial tasks, but little else.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_16<tab>Gigi, on the other hand, is quite intelligent. And quite <var 1A 02 /var>stubborn<var 1A 01 /var>, I might add.

TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_17<tab>I suspect that's due to his age. He's been with the guild for an <var 1A 02 /var>eternity<var 1A 01 /var>, ever attending each guildmaster. But recently, he's been coming and going as he pleases.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_18<tab>NE※GIGIGI★※... KnEeL bEfOrE GiGi, ThE oNe TrUe GuIlDmAsTeR. rEsPeCt My AuThOrItY, iGnOrAnT mOrTaL, oR sUfFeR mY wRaTh!

TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_19<tab><sigh> It's like this <var 1A 02 /var>every<var 1A 01 /var> day, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm afraid the experience he's accumulated over a century of assisting guildmasters has made him arrogant.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_20<tab>It's quite intimidating, really. I may be the guildmaster, but he's like a walking, talking archive of all knowledge to do with our craft.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_21<tab>Oh! I completely forgot about your ingot! Sorry, sorry...
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_22<tab>As I was about to say, I think this is very, very good for a beginner! It's reasonably pure and well formed.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_23<tab>I daresay you've got a knack for this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What you need now is <var 1A 02 /var>practice<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_24<tab>So keep practicing with your hammer, and come back here when you've gotten more comfortable using it.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SERENDIPITY_000_25<tab>NE※GIGIGI★※... BuGgEr OfF, gReEnHoRn.
TEXT_CLSGLD021_00610_SYSTEM_000_26<tab>The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 5.
